mapper.select: SELECT notice_idx , userinfo_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_regDate , notice_viewcnt FROM NOTICE WHERE notice_idx=#{noticeIdx}

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM notice
WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%') OR notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%')
WHERE 1=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM , RN.* FROM (
SELECT notice_idx , userinfo_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_regDate , notice_viewcnt FROM notice
WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%') OR notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{selectKeyword}, '%')
WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY notice_regDate DESC ) RN, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) tmp )SUB WHERE SUB.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
